author: Carlo Piovano
title: World oil demand forecast to suffer biggest drop ever - The Associated Press
description: World oil demand forecast to suffer biggest drop ever The Associated Press Oil Hits $20 After API Reports Mega Crude Inventory Build OilPrice.com Glutted Oil Markets’ Next Worry: Subzero Prices The Wall Street Journal NST Leader: Crude deal New Straits Times …
content:
LONDON (AP) Global demand for oil will fall this year by the most ever due to the economic lockdowns enforced around the world to contain the coronavirus pandemic, the International Energy Agency said Wednesday.
